[i]Eminence[/i] – Whenever you sacrifice a creature, if Bradius, Hell Carver is in the command zone or on the battlefield, you may exile it from your graveyard and put a skull counter on it.
When Bradius enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice another creature. If you do, Bradius deals damage equal to that creatures power to each opponent.
[i]Skullkeeping[/i] – Minotaur you control have double strike as long as you own four or more cards in exile with skull counters on them.
